title: 2bedroom 1 bath ADU - Brand New Construction 3 blocks to beach
posting_body: ['My family and I are just completing construction of a ~800sq.ft.', '2bd 1bath separated ADU.', 'The unit includes a full kitchen, washer and dryer, ample light, outdoor deck, and opportunity for use of shared garden space.', 'Located in the Arleta Park neighborhood 3 blocks to the beach and an easy walk to Ocean View Park, Hatch Elementary, and downtown.', 'This is an incredible neighborhood and a good community.', 'We are a family of four who live in the main house.', 'We have two active kids and two cats.', "Our best match would be someone who doesn't intend to stay long-term, who has an active lifestyle that often takes them away for weekends or other times, and who enjoys the outdoor community and access we have here on the Coastside.", 'We would not be a good fit for people seeking to work from home, for people concerned about noise, or for people looking for a long term housing solution.', 'We are open to LGBTQI+, artists, hippies, musicians, professionals, nurses, entrepreneurs, and others who respect that our family is opening our property to others for the first time and we need flexibility to make it work.', 'No smokers.', 'No dogs.', 'Rent can be negotiable depending on the situation.', 'At this point, we are just exploring what interest there may be - so please respect that we may not respond or be prepared to entertain any specific offer.', 'But we also appreciate that there is a significant need for housing and have moved forward with this project with the hopes of finding a mutually agreeable situation.']
